title: PHPconstant()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPconstant()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the value of a constant:
<?php
//define a constant
define("GREETING","Hello you! How are you today?");
echo constant("GREETING");
?>

Definition and Usage
The constant() function returns the value of a constant.
Note:
This function also works with class constants.
Syntax
constant(
constant
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
constant
Required. Specifies the name of the constant to check
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the value of a constant, or NULL if the constant is not defined
PHP Version:
4+

+1
